If you are between sizes or need assistance selecting the proper size, please contact Customer Service Designer Pure sophistication with a casual Southern California vibe, the ever-growing Paige jeans empire is rooted in flawless fit from the girl who set the standard. A highly sought-after fit model for denim's heavy-hitters, Los Angeles native Paige Adams-Geller lends her fashion expertise to Paige Denim. Launched in 2004, the brand's instant success and celebrity following is attributed to its trend-setting styles, premium materials, and passion for quality fit, emanating the confidence of denim's "it girl."
